headline: Is Conagra Brands (CAG) Pricing Reflect A 28% One Year Slide And DCF Upside Potential
summary: If you are looking at Conagra Brands and wondering whether the recent price offers value, this article walks you through what the current share price might be implying. The stock closed at US$17.37, with a 4.8% return over the last 7 days, a 2.1% decline over the last 30 days, and a return of 0.4% year to date, compared with a 28.0% decline over 1 year, 47.0% over 3 years, and 36.1% over 5 years. Recent coverage around Conagra Brands has focused on its position in the packaged foods sector...
